shortdesc.ph: Callback triggered when the local user fails to receive a data stream message sent by a remote user.
callback: triggered when the local user fails to receive a data stream sent by a remote user.

section.p: This callback is triggered when the local user fails to receive a stream message sent by a remote user using .

section.note: If you need a more comprehensive solution for low latency, high concurrency, and scalable real-time messaging and state synchronization, consider using Real-time Messaging.
